languages.text: "Футфол всегда был грязен, как порог храма грязен от множества вытертых о него ботинок. Но он всегда был и остается порогом Простора, с него началось наше завоевание этих систем. Если вам не нравится, каков он... Что же, вы слишком брезгливы и не ведаете, каков облик фронтира во все времена. Впрочем, я не собираюсь оправдываться перед сумасшедшей. Все знают, что у нее мания судить людей".

"Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."
languages.original_text: "Футфол всегда был грязен, как порог храма грязен от множества вытертых о него ботинок. Но он всегда был и остается порогом Простора, с него началось наше завоевание этих систем. Если вам не нравится, каков он... Что же, вы слишком брезгливы и не ведаете, каков облик фронтира во все времена. Впрочем, я не собираюсь оправдываться перед сумасшедшей. Все знают, что у нее мания судить людей".

languages.text: “落脚港一直都很肮脏，就像神殿的门槛被鞋踩脏一样。但它是科罗努斯扩区的门槛，它一直都是这么肮脏，以后也不会变。这里就是我们征服这些星系的起点，而你如果不喜欢这里的样子……那是因为你太懦弱了，而且你根本不知道帝国的边疆一直以来都是什么样子的。我懒得和这个疯婆子辩解什么，所有人都知道，她审判别人已经上瘾了。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港一直都很肮脏，就像神殿的门槛被鞋踩脏一样。但它是科罗努斯扩区的门槛，它一直都是这么肮脏，以后也不会变。这里就是我们征服这些星系的起点，而你如果不喜欢这里的样子……那时因为你太懦弱了，而且你根本不知道帝国的边疆都是什么样子的。我懒得和这个疯婆子辩解什么，所有人都知道，她审判别人已经上瘾了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「フットフォールは常に汚れていた。寺の入り口が、沢山の靴に拭かれて汚れているように。だがフットフォールは常に、そしてこれからもエクスパンスの入口であり続けるだろう。私たちの征服は今始まったばかりだ。今のままが嫌なら…きっと君はあまりに神経質で、どの時代であっても、フロンティアがどのようなものなのか理解できないだろう。あのイカレ女を正当化させるつもりではないが。彼女が人を裁くことに執着していることは、一目瞭然だ」
languages.original_text: "Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールは常に汚れていた。寺の入り口が、沢山の靴に拭かれて汚れているように。だがフットフォールは常に、そしてこれからもエクスパンスの入口であり続けるだろう。私たちの征服は今始まったばかりだ。今のままが嫌なら…きっと君はあまりに神経質で、どの時代であっても、フロンティアがどのようなものなのか理解できないだろう。あのイカレ女を正当化させるつもりではないが。彼女が人を裁くことに執着していることは、一目瞭然だ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Paso siempre ha sido un lugar sucio, como la entrada de un templo por los zapatos que se limpian en ella, pero siempre ha sido el umbral de la Extensión. Aquí es donde empezó nuestra conquista a los sistemas. Si no le gusta tal como es... entonces es demasiado remilgada y no tiene ni idea de lo que es una frontera en cualquier época. No es que intente justificarme ante una loca. Todo el mundo sabe que tiene fijación por juzgar a la gente».
languages.original_text: "Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."

traits.locale_text: «Paso siempre ha sido un lugar sucio, como la entrada de un templo por los zapatos que se limpian en ella, pero siempre ha sido el umbral de la Extensión. Aquí es donde empezó nuestra conquista a los sistemas. Si no le gusta tal como es... Entonces es demasiado remilgada y no tiene ni idea de lo que es una frontera. No es que intente justificarme ante una loca. Todo el mundo sabe que tiene fijación por juzgar a la gente».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Footfall war schon immer schmutzig, wie die Schwelle eines Tempels schmutzig von den vielen Schuhen ist, die darauf abgewischt werden. Doch es war auch schon immer die Schwelle zur Ausdehnung, und wird es auch bleiben. Hier hat unsere Eroberung dieser Systeme begonnen. Wenn Euch die Station nicht gefällt ... Nun, dann seid Ihr zu zimperlich und habt keine Vorstellung davon, wie ein Grenzgebiet aussieht, egal zu welcher Zeit. Nicht, dass ich Lust hätte, mich vor einer Wahnsinnigen zu rechtfertigen. Jeder weiß, dass sie darauf fixiert ist, andere zu verurteilen."
languages.original_text: "Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."

traits.locale_text: "Footfall war schon immer schmutzig, wie die Schwelle eines Tempels schmutzig von den vielen Schuhen ist, die darauf abgewischt werden. Doch es war auch schon immer die Schwelle zur Ausdehnung, und wird es auch bleiben. Hier hat unsere Eroberung dieser Systeme begonnen. Wenn Euch die Station nicht gefällt ... Nun, dann seid Ihr zu zimperlich und habt keine Vorstellung davon, wie ein Grenzgebiet aussieht. Nicht, dass ich Lust hätte, mich vor einer Wahnsinnigen zu rechtfertigen. Jeder weiß, dass sie darauf fixiert ist, andere zu verurteilen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Castel a toujours été un endroit sale, comme le seuil d'un temple souillé par tous les pieds que l'on y essuie, mais ça n'en reste pas moins le seuil des Étendues. C'est ici que notre conquête de ces systèmes a commencé. Si l'état de cette station vous plaît pas... cela signifie simplement que vous êtes trop délicate et que vous n'avez aucune notion de ce à quoi ressemble une frontière. C'est un simple état de fait, je ne ressens pas le besoin de me justifier devant une folle furieuse qui ne pense qu'à juger les autres. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."

traits.locale_text: « Castel a toujours été un endroit sale, comme le seuil d'un temple souillé par tous les pieds que l'on y essuie, mais ça n'en reste pas moins le seuil des Étendues. C'est ici que notre conquête de ces systèmes a commencé, et si l'état de cette station vous plaît pas... cela signifie simplement que vous êtes trop délicate et que vous n'avez aucune notion de ce à quoi ressemble une frontière. C'est un simple état de fait, je ne ressens pas le besoin de me justifier devant une folle furieuse qui ne pense qu'à juger les autres. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Binliman, her daim kirli bir yerdi. Tıpkı bir tapınağın eşiğinin, oraya basılan ayakkabılar nedeniyle kirli olması gibi. Fakat burası her daim Enginlik'in eşiği olmuştur ve öyle olmayı da sürdürecektir. Sistemleri fethimizin başladığı yer burasıdır. Eğer buranın hâlinden hoşlanmıyorsanız o hâlde biraz fazla titizsinizdir ve bir çağın başlangıcına önayak olan sınır bölgesinin neye benzediği konusunda hiçbir fikriniz yoktur. Kendimi deli karının tekine açıklamaya çalışmak da istemiyorum. İnsanları yargılamaya meraklı olduğunu herkes biliyor."
languages.original_text: "Footfall has always been dirty, like the threshold of a temple is dirty from all the shoes wiped on it. But it's always been, and will remain, the threshold of the Expanse. Here is where our conquest of these systems began. If you don't like it the way it is... why, then, you're too squeamish and have no concept of what a frontier of any era looks like. Not that I care to justify myself to a madwoman. Everybody knows she's fixated on judging people."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman her daim kirli bir yerdi. Tıpkı bir tapınağın eşiğinin, orada temizlenen ayakkabılar nedeniyle kirli olması gibi. Ama burası her daim Enginlik'in eşiği olmuştur ve öyle olmayı da sürdürecektir. Sistemleri fethimizin başladığı yer burasıdır. Eğer buranın hâlinden hoşlanmıyorsanız, o hâlde biraz fazla titizsinizdir ve bir çağın başlangıcına önayak olan bir cehpenin neye benzediği konusunda hiçbir fikriniz yoktur. Kendimi deli kadının tekine açıklamaya çalışmak da istemiyorum. İnsanları yargılamaya meraklı olduğunu herkes biliyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
